name: Jet Coaster Dream 2
overview: A sequel to "Jet Coaster Dream", known as Coaster Works outside of Japan, "Jet Coaster Dream 2" expands the roller coaster building aspects of the first game to include more management of the park itself. The game was originally set for release in the US and Europe, but was cancelled in 2001 due to the discontinuation of the Sega Dreamcast.
